newsitem.title: PERU: Peru's Ferreyros places $22.55 mln shrs.
newsitem.headline: Peru's Ferreyros places $22.55 mln shrs.

text.p: Peruvian importer Ferreyros SA said Wednesday it had successfully placed all $22.55 million of new shares offered in a global sale.
The common shares and American Depositary Shares (ADS) were sold at 2.39 soles ($0.90) each, Ferreyros general manager Oscar Espinosa told Reuters.
He added that two-thirds of the new shares were sold in the United States, while the rest were bought locally.
"Today, we have formalized all the orders accepted a week ago," he said, adding the money raised from the issue was to increase the company's capital.
Ferreyros, which mainly imports heavy industry machinery from the United States, closed at 2.61 soles on the local market Wednesday.
The international portion of the sale was handled by Merrill Lynch & Co Inc and the local part by Banco de Credito.
